channel.title: New Hitsplats
channel.description:
Oh yes, they are finally here. Along with damage absorption they are Jagex's latest updates that come out today. And tbh, they aren't as bad as I expected them to be. So far the only thing I don't paticularily like is the 0 hit splat, which just looks like some arrows bouncing off a blue dot. Here's briefly what they look like:
Range:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/vnh3xl.png[/img]
Mage:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2z4w9kx.png[/img]
Melee:
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/16hs2eu.png[/img]
I'm not 100% on how damage absorption works however it looks like pures are absolutely fucked.
Discuss

item.title: New Hitsplats
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:3, topic:373254”]This update is shit for many reasons. . .

  1. What the hell was wrong with the old hitsplats?!?! It is like they update because they have nothing better to do . . .
  2. It is sooo pointless with the absorption thing, just gonna throw that out there.
  3. the most important reason. . . Rsbot is outdated lol[/quote]SOOOOOOOOO TRUE

Read full topic

item.title: New Hitsplats
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:14, topic:373254”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=469271.msg3431263#msg3431263 date=1292372054]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=469271.msg3431261#msg3431261 date=1292371892]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=469271.msg3431225#msg3431225 date=1292369343]

If you want to read more about how damage absorption will affect it, you can read my thread.

As for the hit splats, I think Jagex deserves a ++ for this one. Something that I actually think people will like.

Yeah, mainly because the majority of players aren’t pures.
[/quote]“As for the hit splats”, I wasn’t talking about the damage absorption for something people will like

Misread, etc. I, for one, hate the new hit splats.
[/quote]What don’t you like about them?
Personally, I like knowing who hits what damage
[/quote]can you link me to your thread?[/quote]It is still on the front page lol

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read through it for pros/cons etc

Read full topic
